p:
Lately, molecular and gene-specific studies focus on the role of genes like SOX9, PAX7, BMP, FGF, Wnt, MMP’s which are usually associated with regeneration
20, 27– 31 . The expression of SOX9 during cartilage formation, PAX7 associating in tissue morphogenesis
28, 31 , BMP6 and other protein expressions were known
29, 30 . Constitutive expression and regulation of these genes have revealed a significant role during the developmental stages of regeneration. The slight alteration in any of the crucial genes regulation might results in a disrupted replacement
32 . Thus, the activation and intricate cross-talk of these molecules during the process are still unaddressed and need to be better understood.
